DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to validate the sanitary consequences of dental studies respectively the longtime executed profession. In comparison to this cohort we will also check a collective of subjects with an optimum of physical activity.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Different Working Conditions on Risk Factors in Dentists Versus Trainers
DOC.criteria: Healthy Age 1930 years(longitudinal) 5560 years (crosssectional) Dentists Trainers Pregnant CVD Medication; and Diseases affecting body composition
